name: FleppiBurd
description:
This game is called FleppiBurd. NOT Flappy Bird.
This game is totally not a rip off.

I do not support piracy or plagiarism. That being said;

You control Burd by using Spacebar to make sure they stay afloat and Fleppi.

Avoid hitting the ceiling, the ground, or the black walls.

Survive for as long as you can for the highest score.
